tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE golf_courses ( course_id INT PRIMARY KEY, course_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), course_layout TEXT )
CREATE TABLE course_details ( course_id INT, par INT, yardage INT, difficulty VARCHAR(50), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES golf_courses(course_id) )
CREATE TABLE golfers ( golfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, golfer_name VARCHAR(255), age INT, handicap FLOAT )

CREATE TABLE golf_courses_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES golf_courses(id)
);

CREATE TABLE tournament_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    score INT,
    position INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES golf_players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tournament_id) REFERENCES golf_courses_schedule(schedule_id)
);
